medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior with abdominal pain primarily in the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Yesterday, the patient experienced diffuse abdominal pain. Accompanying symptoms include nausea, vomiting, and decreased appetite. The patient also reports subjective fevers. Symptoms have been progressively worsening.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes mellitus and coronary artery disease.
